summary: Everyday lives of people in Belgrade who are obsessed with their weaknesses and led by their passions. Seven independent stories on 7 deadly sins are told in a comical tone.
cast: Branislav Trifunovic|Nikola Vujovic|Milos Timotijevic|Marija Karan|Branko Vidakovic|Boris Komnenic|Nenad Jezdic|Gordan Kicic|Natasa Markovic|Ljubinka Klaric|Milan 'Lane' Gutovic|Nikola Djuricko|Boris Milivojevic|Mira Stupica|Srdjan Miletic|Milos Samolov|Mladen Nelevic|Gordana Djurdjevic|Andjelika Simic|Marko Vasovic|Radoslav 'Rale' Milenkovic|Tomislav Trifunovic|Ksenija Bujisic|Aleksandra Jankovic|Djordje Marjanovic|Kokan Mladenovic|Goran Sultanovic|Ahmed Buric|Dejan Momcilovic|Dubravko Jovanovic|Zorka Manojlovic|Ana Stanic|Milica Mihajlovic|Marija Arsic|Ana Maljevic|Veselina Mihajlovic|Bora Nenic
title: Sedam i po
